Volleyball assignment
Dylan Manfre

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#loading data
teams <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dwillis/NCAAWomensVolleyballData/main/data/ncaa_womens_volleyball_matchstats_2021.csv")
```

```{r}

team_avgs <- teams %>% 
  group_by(team) %>% 
  summarize(
            kills_avg = mean(kills),
            aces_avg = mean(aces),
            digs_avg = mean(digs),
            def_kill_avg = mean(defensive_kills),
            error_avg = mean(errors),
            hit_perc_avg = mean(hit_pct),
            service_error_avg = mean(s_err)) %>% 
  select(team, kills_avg, aces_avg, digs_avg, def_kill_avg, error_avg, hit_perc_avg, service_error_avg)


```
